results.text: You learn a region-specific name for a nearby point of interest, such as a ruin, mine, grove, or other locale within a 5-mile vicinity. This location is not found on any map, but locals will direct you to it.
You’ve ascertained one tradegood that is in high demand in the area. For the next 24 hours, merchants give you a better price on goods and services if you offer it for trade.

You learn the local slang for something secretive (and possibly illegal), such as a secret society or the black market. When you next use this slang in conversation with a local, you gain a piece of Key Knowledge regarding the topic.
You’ve picked up on one of the more esoteric local customs (Narrator’s choice). The attitude of the locals improves towards you by one step.

You recall a vague or little-cited law in this region that could get you out of a bind. For the next hour, if you run afoul of the authorities for a minor crime you may cite this law to get yourself or an ally out of trouble.
You leverage your command of social mores and etiquette to your benefit. For the next week, you have advantage on your next Culture check made to impress with your politeness or manners.
